1.1.3.name: wordpress/flowsplit
1.1.3.description:
Idea to definition proudly copied from Steve Hanov's blog: http://stevehanov.ca/blog/index.php?id=132 Thanks Steve!

This plugin helps you split testing content in a WordPress post or page. You place the content inside shortcode tags and the output will show the content that gives the best outcome/clicks.

Introduction

Installation

Example

Please use GitHub as communication point for this plugin!
